cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Single bunk bed with curtains, charging ports, access to shared bathroom, kitchen and laundry facilities. Sleep in airconditioned comfort with pillow, bed linen and blanket provided. Price is per room per night for one person and includes free Wi-Fi.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The Ideal choice for those wanting privacy, and comfort. Boasting a King Bed or two single king beds, privacy lighting, and AC, individual secure lockers (own padlock required) bed linen and blanket supplied, WIFI and access to shared Bathroom and Kitchen

privates.name: Standard 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Features a king bed or two single beds a kitchenette, private bathroom and patio. Sleep in airconditioned comfort with pillow, bed linen and blanket provided. Access to the shared laundry. Price is per room per night for two people, includes free Wi-Fi.
